newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barges quoted steady to up on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barges quoted steady to up on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted at mostly steady to higher levels on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. No barges traded versus 10 barges traded on Thursday, Exchange sources said.
- Two barges, next week, Mid-Mississippi, Clinton and South, Load and Release by December 3, $250 per day thereafter, bid 185 percent of tariff, offered one barge at 190 percent.
- One barge, next week, Illinois River, bid 155 percent, offer 167-1/2 percent.
- Two barges, next week, Mid-Mississippi, bid 190 percent, no offer.
- Five barges, one each week December, Illinois River, bid 150 percent, up five percentage points, offered at 155 percent, unchanged from Thursday.
- Four barges, one each week January, Illinois River, no bid, offer 215 percent.
